pref_enable_alerts.description: Show an alert in the window list when a window from another workspace requires attention

pref_enable_scrolling.description: Enable mouse-wheel scrolling in the window list

pref_reverse_scrolling.description: Reverse the direction of mouse-wheel scrolling in the window list

pref_buttons_use_entire_space.description: Window buttons can have different sizes and use the entire space available

pref_hide_labels.description: Hide labels in the window list buttons. (Cinnamon will be restarted)
